name: conway_slow
description: Local testnet that starts in Byron era and hard-forks through all the protocol versions until it gets to Conway.

control_env.DBSYNC_SCHEMA_DIR: will start and configure db-sync if the value is path to db-sync schema directory
control_env.SMASH: if set, will start and configure smash
control_env.ENABLE_LEGACY: if set, local cluster will use legacy networking
control_env.MIXED_P2P: if set, local cluster will use P2P for some nodes and legacy topology for others
control_env.UTXO_BACKEND: 'mem' or 'disk', default is 'mem' (or legacy) if unset
control_env.NO_CC: if set, will not create committee
control_env.DRY_RUN: if set, will not start the cluster
